answers.answer: sorry i havent had this problem but i would talk to your doc about this..it could have something to do with your blood pressure.
Have you had a complete blood work up yet? Maybe you have a low red blood cell count (anemia?) I have this issue every once in a while, but I think it's related to a low count.
Me too, I was tired all the time and was dizzy on and off. I had really low iron. I've been on 150mg a day for 3 weeks and feel much better

question: Im 28 weeks and the last 3 days I have woke up extremely dizzy. The room just spins when I close my eyes to go back to sleep. Is this normal? I do have gestational diabetes but I have checked my sugar during this and it's normal. Anyone else having this problem?
title: Waking up dizzy
